Body: Description: Hi, after discussing earlier today, I was able to get a snapshot of our server and are ready to update to 5.9.4.1, i will be doing it in morning. i would like to have a call again to discuss the CAP policies after the update. it was mentioned the update could fix some things that were not going right such as our Contextual Detection and a few other things such as EPPNotifier does not turn off on a specific policy and I am getting told my users I have been testing on that they are annoyred with it. Is there possibility to have a zoom any time in between 11am PT-1:30 PT, or 2:45pm PT to 5pm PT.
